channel.title: Newest Gallery
channel.description:

I got lots better LOL. Only one of those sigs is from a tutorial, and it's the fourth one. I can't do anything about the banner lol too lazy to change.

item.title: Newest Gallery
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

The third one could have been so much better had you not split it into two different sigs.

Read full topic

item.title: Newest Gallery
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Tbh i think they aint great i dont really think you are improving tbh well ill go ahead and give you help

  1. Ok well i dont mind smudge sigs but you have gone way out of hand with the smudging also the render doesnt blend in at all

  2. Ok my eyes go straight to the dice and i know you didnt intend that also i am not sure about the splatter brushing not only th colours of them but i dont think they go with it

  3. I love the colours on this but its all to far to the left leaving some blank space and the dice just mak me dislike it more

  4. There is just way to much going on put me right off.

  5. Ok this my favorite of the lot i love simple sigs because i think people try to make things more advance and fuck it up its simple its basic i like it just its a bit blank in areas

I cba to C&C the rest i now it wont alot but i hope it helps

Read full topic
